go_data.justification: phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase is involved in the production of PI-3-phosphate (PI-3P).
phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase is required for the membrane recruitment of EEA1 and the regulation of fusion of plasma membrane-derived CCVs with early endosomes.
phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase is recruited to early endosomes.
